name: Samp RP
description: Welcome to the world of the Samp RP. Grand Theft Auto style of game with hints of role playing.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i5 Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 750 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 970 Storage: 200 MB available space
